page.title: 07TRANSPORT
page.content: SHIPS FROM 4.5 TO 5 THOUSAND TONS ONLY BECAUSE OF DOG LEG BEND IN SWALE.LARGE CONTAINERS ARE LOADED INTO BARGES WHICH SAIL RIGHT INTO AN ENORMOUS MOTHER SHIP OFF SHEERNESS. RAIL FREIGHT FROM RIDHAM DOCKS TO STEEL WORKS AND TO KEMSLEY PAPER MILLS. HEAVY LORRIES BRING IN MATERIAL FOR CAR FRAGMENTATION PLANT. GOVERNMENT SOUTHERN WATER BOARD IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE SWALE. DREDGERS KEEP THE CHANNEL CLEAR AND TEST FOR POLLUTION. ALTHOUGH FISHING IS NOT ALLOWED IN THE RIDHAM DOCK AREA OF THE SWALE, THERE ARE FISH THERE.
